item.title: InDraw -- Convert Figures to SMILES with AI
item.author: 小恐龙 | Little Dinosaur
item.description: InDraw for web is a powerful online chemical structure drawing tool. It can convert chemical figures (in articles, for example) to SMILES so that we can edit the structures ourselves. Currently, it only supports Chinese. Let’s see how it works. Step 1. Register Step 2. Convert Find a figure of chemical structure, paste it into the canvas。 Note: ⚠️ Don’t forget to manually check it before using it!
